channel.title: Modicons help

item.title: Modicons help
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

317 pi (hybridpvp base)
i set up new donor icons and everything went right… except in clanchat my superdonor icon shows as the royaldonor icon and my royaldonor icon doesnt show… i looked through the client.java and everything seemed right.

[QUOTE]
if(chatType == 16) {
int j2 = 40;
int clanNameWidth = textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(clanname);
if(chatTypeView == 11 || chatTypeView == 0) {
if(yPos > 3 && yPos < 130)
switch(chatRights[k]) {
case 1:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[0].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 14;
break;
case 2:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[1].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 14;
break;
case 3:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[2].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 14;
break;
case 4:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[3].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 14;
break;
case 5:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[4].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 14;
break;
default:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
break;
}[/QUOTE]
(thats where i think the clanchat part for icons is)
modicon3-super modicon4-royal
also my royal donor icon in public chat doesnt show for thierself, only everyone else can see thier royaldonoricon in public chat… if anyone can tv and help fix plz do i can pay 5m rsgp if you want, because my paypal is limited atm and wont let me spend

Read full topic
